author: kindra.cl
description: A module to integrate Instagram messaging functionality.

active.description: Whether the Instagram module is active

accessToken.description: API access token for WhatsApp Business API

phoneNumberId.description: The phone number ID associated with the WhatsApp Business API

allowPersistentChanges.description: Whether to allow persistent changes to other modules to be triggered by WhatsApp messages

allowModuleInteroperation.description: Whether to allow interaction with other modules in response to WhatsApp messages

webhookTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds to aggregate webhook calls by userID before processing
